sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a rectangle.
message_1: A rectangle has a length of 20 cm and a width of 12 cm. Find the perimeter of the rectangle.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a rectangle, use the formula P = 2(L + W), where P is the perimeter, L is the length, and W is the width.

In this case, L = 20 cm and W = 12 cm.

P = 2(20 + 12)
P = 2(32)
P = 64 cm

The perimeter of the rectangle is 64 cm.
